fields.name: Time(UTC)
fields.title: Time
fields.description: date and time of start of averaged time period during which the horizontal particle flux was measured in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-mm-dd hh:mm:ss [UTC]

fields.name: Horizontal particle flux [#.m-2.s-1]
fields.title: Horizontal particle flux
fields.description: total snow particle flux during the one-minute interval [# m-2 s-1]
